comment: * Utility class to parse a string description of a size.

variables.name: type
variables.comment:
* One of Animation.ABSOLUTE, Animation.RELATIVE_TO_SELF, or
         * Animation.RELATIVE_TO_PARENT.

variables.name: value
variables.comment: * The absolute or relative dimension for this Description.

methods.name: static Description parseValue(TypedValue value, Context context)
methods.comment:
* Size descriptions can appear in four forms: *
    *
  1. An absolute size. This is represented by a number.
    2. *
  2. A size relative to the size of the object being animated. This * is represented by a number followed by "%".
    3. *
  3. A size relative to the size of the parent of object being * animated. This is represented by a number followed by "%p".
    4. *
  4. (Starting from API 32) A complex number.
    5. *
* @param value The typed value to parse * @return The parsed version of the description

methodNames: static Description parseValue(TypedValue value, Context context)
